DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy gains Radiance, it takes damage equal to its total Radiance. If you have Radiance, you deal #b10% more attack damage per stack. Whenever a character gains Radiance, it loses #b1 Radiance at the end of its turn.
You can target #yANY character with this card. Consume #b1 Radiance from the character to trigger an effect.
If this card is in your discard pile, it #yexhausts. Fading cards have a #b5% chance of disappearing from card rewards for each Fading card in your deck.
Return the bottom-most card from the exhaust Pile to your hand.
